review: This is simply the most advanced streaming media player on the market. Period. I made this purchase with low expectations, but was amazed at how easy it was to set up and use, and the ability to play games was an added bonus - most are free and my son loves them! Thanks to the generous internal memory for buffering, once laggy playback has become a turbo-charged viewing experience. Highly recommended!
author: Sid B

review: Love my Amazon Fire!hours and hours of fun!

review: Overall impressed. Some minor issues here and there, but don't know for sure if it's the Fire TV or the actual app. This blows away my Roku 2 player I had. Super fast menu scrolling and loading time for videos seem super short!

review: This is the best invention since the computer. It's so easy to set up, so easy to use, has so many great options. I love it, I recommend it.

review: The Fire TV device delivered exactly what i was looking for - content that makes my treadmill time more enjoyable.  There are 2 things I do wish that were easily available:1. Automatic recognition of my wife's Prime membership.  Maybe I just didn't push the correct button, but it asked if i wanted to test drive Prime for 30 days.  I'm certain I'll get it square but.....2. Easy access to our FIOS (in our case; Cox/Comcast etc for anyone else) content.  Again, there might be a magic button that I haven't found.This is a very good product and I'd buy another.
author: Mike Stewart
